website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and well fitted, these leggings make working out feel more fun and effortless.
pros: Crop cut leaves calves exposed for good ventilation
Wide, soft waistband keeps everything nicely tucked away
cons: Pilling is a problem even on the first wearing

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and washes well. My only complaint is the outrageous pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Lululemon is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these - my first pair of Lululemon and now I know why people love this brand. So soft, comfortable and washes/dries well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Lulu’s are worth the $$. They last forever and are awesome workout tights. They are the only Lulu item I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They weren't the same size as EVERY other pair I own.
customer_reviews.text: I buy the same size of Lululemon pants for my gf EVERY time. She has several different styles. Unfortunately she had a death of someone extremely close to her and didn't even open these pants until last week. It's now outside the return window. The pants aren't consistent with all the others size wise.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Notnsoft material
customer_reviews.text: The material was not soft as my other lululemons. I’m not sure why? It cost the same, very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Seemed more like bike riding material
customer_reviews.text: Not as stretchy and soft as I thought they would be. Seemed more like bike riding material.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes you look good, but the fit is a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Lululemon has pretty detailed descriptions/classifications for their clothes that were not available ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size and these were very, very tight. Lululemon has pretty detailed descriptions/classifications for their clothes that were not available in the description here (basically what's on the tag) and that would have helped me pick the most appropriate size. Quality was great though!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Love these dresses
customer_reviews.text: Love these dresses, I have every color of this style. Very flattering and can be dress up or dressed down.
customer_reviews.author: ShaHad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The gray is a little 'blah' but they fit nicely !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I am sad to say after being a great customer for over ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small hassle with duty and taxes...I am sad to say after being a great customer for over 100 purchases I really thought I deserved better than this 😔
customer_reviews.author: Arlen Jalbert

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey - not as high quality as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Not so enthused about this leggings - not worth for the price I paid. There's other high quality leggings out there, for less than half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lululemon Wunder Under Crop III Yoga Pants
product_meta.description: Lululemon created these crops to be a no-fuss tight for our yoga practice, but we just couldn't stop wearing them. The second-skin fit makes it easy to check our alignment and the calf-length leg gives us room to breathe when we're breaking a sweat.
feature_bullets: Lululemon created these crops to be a no-fuss tight for our yoga practice, but we just couldn't stop wearing them. The second-skin fit makes it easy to check our alignment and the calf-length leg gives us room to breathe when we're breaking a sweat.
Full-On Luxtreme fabric features interlock construction offers great support and coverage with a smooth, cool feel. Added LYCRA fibre moves with you and stays in great shape.
Stash your keys and gym pass in the signature waistband pocket.
Full On Luxtreme 63% Nylon, 22% Lycra Elastane, 15% Polyester.
